author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.1.3` -- Protect Poutu-te-rangi -- released!
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.1.3

This is non-substantive with respect to Altair specs, but additional **critical** test vectors have been released.
*Clients are suggested to build and run these additional Altair test vectors immediately*

Huge shoutout to <@!755590043632140352> for identifying the holes in the vectors that led to better transition coverage in this release!
